name: Deja Vu (Owen Ayers)
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 54: Memories.

This was not only my first Game Jam, but also the first time I have made a game start to finish in Unity independent of a step-by-step tutorial.

Through this Game Jam I strengthened my familiarity with Unity and was able to accomplish a lot of personal goals.

A big thank you to my wonderful girlfriend Jessica, for without her tremendous love and support, I would never have found the courage and energy to finish this Game Jam submission.
